title: Former FM Igor Ivanov: Yevgeny Primakov Was an Outstanding Leader — Valdai Club

quotes: Just like the news of Primakov’s appointment as foreign minister, his appointment as prime minister in September 1998 came as a complete surprise to me.

organizations.name: Foreign Intelligence Service
quotes: Yevgeny Primakov had been promoted from the Foreign Intelligence Service to the post of foreign minister.

organizations.name: State Duma
quotes: I was returning to the ministry from the State Duma when I received a call summoning me to Primakov’s office.

roles.title: foreign minister
quotes: Yevgeny Primakov had been promoted from the Foreign Intelligence Service to the post of foreign minister.
Primakov’s appointment as foreign minister marked the start of a new direction in Russia’s foreign policy

roles.title: first deputy foreign minister
quotes: I was first deputy foreign minister at the time, and so the news affected me personally.
I was lucky to work as his first deputy.

roles.title: prime minister
quotes: his appointment as prime minister in September 1998 came as a complete surprise to me.

supporting_quotes: Yevgeny Primakov had been promoted from the Foreign Intelligence Service to the post of foreign minister.
Primakov’s appointment as foreign minister marked the start of a new direction in Russia’s foreign policy
